Question: This person also has a problem of letting people take advantage of him, or not sticking up for himself when people pick on him.
Hints: This person is an avid kite-flyer, but his kites keep landing in a "Kite-Eating Tree" or suffering even worse fates.
Peanuts Sunday strips were often titled Peanuts featuring Good Ol' this person.
This person is almost always addressed by his full name by other characters in the strip.
